trans-unit.source: Represents a segment of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representa um segmento de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from PathSegment, such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, represent specific types of geometric segments.
trans-unit.target: As classes que derivem de PathSegment, tais como <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment>, representar a tipos específicos de segmentos geométrica.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.BezierSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: **Freezable Features:** Because PathSegment objects inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, they provide several special features: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: **Funcionalidades freezable:** porque PathSegment objetos herdam a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, que fornecem várias funcionalidades especiais: podem ser declaradas como, partilhada entre vários objetos, tornados só de leitura para melhorar o desempenho, clonados e efetuadas seguro para thread.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features that are provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as diferentes funcionalidades que são fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte [descrição geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> fazendo profundas cópias dos seus valores.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para produzir modificável cópias só de leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método copia propriedades de dependência, copia enlaces de dados e as referências de recurso embora estes já não poderão resolver.

trans-unit.source: It does not copy animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Não copia animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia modificável profunda do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the cloned object returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade do objeto clonado devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo que o <> </> *> é propriedade da origem<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable copy of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> object by making deep copies of its values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia deste modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> objeto fazendo profundas cópias dos seus valores.

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values.
trans-unit.target: Este método não copia as referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações, embora se copiar os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este método para produzir modificável cópias só de leitura <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia modificável profunda do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property of the source is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> propriedade é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo que o <> </> *> é propriedade da origem de <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is treated as a corner when it is stroked with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a associação entre este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> e anterior <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> é tratado como um canto quando é stroked com um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the join between this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> and the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"></xref> is not to be treated as a corner; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a associação entre este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> e anterior <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathSegment"> </xref> não deve ser tratado como um canto; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsSmoothJoin*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the segment is stroked.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o segmento é stroked.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> object has this property set to `true`, that object contributes to the stroked area of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> when rendered by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objeto tem esta propriedade definida como `true`, esse objeto contribui para a área stroked de <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>Quando composto por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, the extra area added by a Pen affects hit testing and explicit operations to widen the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.
trans-unit.target: Se esta propriedade é `true`, as operações de teste e explícitas para alargar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry> de acertos na área de extra adicionada por um afeta caneta

trans-unit.source: When you switch between stroked and non-stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> sections in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, it is considered the same as the dashes of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.
trans-unit.target: Quando mudar entre stroked e não stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>secções num <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>considera-se o mesmo que os traços de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> object determines the shape of the ends of stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen>objeto determina a forma das extremidades da stroked <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Pen.DashCap%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência ||| |-|-| | Campo Identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the segment is stroked when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, the segment is not stroked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o segmento é stroked quando um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> é utilizado para compor o segmento; caso contrário, o segmento não é stroked.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>propriedade de dependência.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathSegment.IsStroked*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.
